name: Cyber Survivor
description:
A Ludum Dare 51 game by Theodore Liem Norell (theheheo)

Soundtrack made by Joel Ekberg, aka DJ WATER DUCK

Background

In a city… where robots are many and surviving is tough, become the greatest cyber survivor this city has ever seen. Your cyber abilities activate every 10 seconds, choose which abilities to use and combine them in a way that you see fit.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Shoot - Mouse 1

Action menu - Q

Pause - Escape or Space
